title: Slide Away
lyrics:
[intro] | (Am) | (G)  (F) |  x2
 
(Am)Slide away and (G)give it all you've (F)got
(Am)My today (G)fell in from the (F)top
I (Am)dream of you and (G)all the things you (F)say
(Am) I wonder where you are now (G) (F)
 
(Am)Hold me down, (G)all the world's (F)asleep
(Am)Need you now, you (G)knocked me off my (F)feet
I (Am)dream of you and we (G)talk of growing (F)old
(Am) But you said "please don't" (G) (F)
 
(G)Slide in (F)baby, to(G)gether we'll (F)fly
(G)I've tried (F)praying but I (G)don't know what you're saying to (G7)me
 
Now that you're (C)mine
We'll find a (G)way
Of chasing the (F)sun
(F) Let me be the (Am)one that shines with (G)you…
In the (D)morning we don't know what to (F)do
 
Two of a (C)kind
We'll find a (G)way
To do what we've (F)done
(F) Let me be the (Am)one that shines with (G)you
And we can slide away (F)  (D)
Slide away (F)  (D)
Slide away (F)  (D)
Awa(G)yyy (E)
 
| (Am) | (G)  (F) |  x2
 
(Am)Slide away and (G)give it all you've (F)got
(Am)My today (G)fell in from the (F)top
I (Am)dream of you and (G)all the things you (F)say
(Am)I wonder where you are now (G) (F)
 
(G)Slide in (F)baby, to(G)gether we'll (F)fly
(G)I've tried (F)praying but I (G)don't know what you're saying to (G7)me
 
Now that you're (C)mine
We'll find a (G)way
Of chasing the (F)sun
(F) Let me be the (Am)one that shines with (G)you…
In the (D)morning we don't know what to (F)do
 
Two of a (C)kind
We'll find a (G)way
To do what we've (F)done
(F) Let me be the (Am)one that shines with (G)you
And we can slide away (F)  (D)
Slide away (F)  (D)
Slide away (F)  (D)
Slide away (F)  (D)  (D-single strum) [end]
